pr_title: Issue #911: `pipe` CLI shall allow to list the users/groups/objects permissions globally

timeline.bodyText: Result of method is ignored, is it correct? Also I assume non-principal sid may be a group not only role

replies.bodyText: @mzueva  This method is used to determine exists group or not. We do not need result of this method itself.

timeline.bodyText: Result of the method call is ignored, is it ok? I assume non-principal sid may be a group not only role.

timeline.message: Issue #911: `pipe` CLI shall allow to list the users/groups/objects permissions globally - fixes for tool/docker_registry listing
